name: Sweet Coconut Iced Cap
description: Blended coffee lovers rejoice! Oh so good! This is made with plant-based ingredients, delivering uber creaminess. Bonus—it’s protein packed!
preparation: 1. In a blender, combine all ingredients except whole food sprinkle. If you like it thicker, add ice cubes; for a thinner consistency, add water. Blend until smooth, pour into a tall glass, and top with whole food sprinkle, if desired.
